description.black-white:
The user turns the target’s power
against it. The higher the target’s
Attack stat, the greater the damage.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage is calculated using the target's attacking stat rather than the user's.
effect.shortEffect: Calculates damage with the target's attacking stat.
